title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 6 categories of Race on the x axis representing 2 groups: 2019, and 2020.
Averaging these 2 groups, the highest category is found for Race Smartphone with a mean value of 35.5.
The lowest category is observed at Other that has a mean value of 3.0
showing a difference of 168.8% with the maximum value.
In case of Smartphone, 2019 shows more dominance than any other Race with a value 35.0 and it has the lowest value 3.0 in Other.
